>> YEAH. I WOULD SAY.

WHO HAS MORE PEOPLE? THE HARD RIGHT OR THE

HERE IS THE PROBLEM. TOO MANY PEOPLE ON THE HARD
RIGHT, TEA PARTY PEOPLE AND OTHERS, BECAUSE OF THEIR

AND, IF THEY DO THAT THEY WILL WIND UP AGAIN BECAUSE

IT MEANS AS FAR AS THE TEA PARTY AND OTHERS ARE
CONCERNED. ANYBODY TO THE LEFT OF TED
CRUZ IS A RINO, REPUBLICAN IN NAME ONLY, WHICH I SAY IS

THE REAL RINOS ARE THE PEOPLE IN THE TEA PARTY AND
ON THE HARD RIGHT BECAUSE THEY HAVE MADE IT CLEAR OVER

HASN’T GOT ANY BETTER AND PEOPLE ARE ANGRY.

HARD RIGHT SIDE? >> YEAH.
IF THINGS ARE HORRENDOUSLY BAD, THE ANSWER IS YES.
BUT ANYTHING SHORT OF THAT, I THINK THE ANSWER IS NO.
AND I THINK THIS -- THIS IS THE EXAMPLE SPLIT.
